data.name: answer1
data.value: Invesafe is a collective investment platform for real estate projects, or real estate crowdfunding, that allows investors and real estate developers to obtain a better financing alternative to those currently in the market. Investors can invest from small amounts and jointly with other investors in the same real estate project

data.name: answer10
data.value: Of course, we make available to investors the documentation of the asset as well as the address so they can visit and corroborate physically.

data.name: answer11
data.value: Your investment will be backed by an ordinary trust contract for each project. Each contract stipulates all the information of the project and your investment percentage according to the amount you have allocated.

data.name: answer12
data.value:
Es un contrato en la cual una persona (inversor) le transmite un capital a otra (promotor), en donde este promotor la ejerce en beneficio al inversor, en un determinado tiempo o hasta que se cumpla una condición *.

(*) The trust is a contract in which a party (Trustee -> Investor), transmits or agrees to transfer money (Investment) to another person (Trustee), who undertakes to exercise it for the benefit of another so-called beneficiary (Investor / Promoter), which is designated in the contract, and to transmit it to the fulfillment of a term or condition to the trustee (in the case it would eventually be the Investor)

data.name: answer2
data.value: Our focus is mainly on residential and commercial properties. These properties in which you can invest, will always be at the price of construction cost (in a well), for renovations or as an opportunity at a price substantially lower than that offered in the market. Thus being a unique opportunity to obtain a good return on investment.

data.name: answer3
data.value: Investing in Real Estate is not easy, it requires a lot of time, knowledge and great capital. That's why we created this platform! So you can invest here in your city, with the capital you have and through real estate experts.

data.name: answer4
data.value: In our Invesafe platform, you will have an account as an investor where you can control and manage your investments from anywhere and at any time. Periodically, our auditors will upload all the information on the progress of works, evolution and information on each project so you can be calm and see day by day how your investment grows.

data.name: answer5
data.value: We perform a due diligence to know how the promoter has worked, requesting references and reviewing the legal and financial documentation of the company.

data.name: answer6
data.value: We do this through a team of specialists, who rigorously analyze and audit the real estate opportunities offered by the different real estate developers. We select only those that have an attractive value in relation to the acquisition cost, construction and / or construction cost, general characteristics, location of the property and the potential future value of the property for sale and rent, according to market trends. This minimizes any investment risk.

data.name: answer7
data.value: Yes, it's easy! Once you have your investment account, you must choose which projects you would like to invest and then just wait to receive your earnings. We will take care of everything.

data.name: answer8
data.value: No, creating your Invesafe account is free and you won't have any fixed maintenance expenses either.

data.name: answer9
data.value: We are directly associated with the success of each project and we only charge a 10% commission on the profit you will receive from your investment. The higher profitability we achieve, the more you and we win
